title: test 2
body:
```mermaid
classDiagram
Animal <|-- Duck
Animal <|-- Fish
Animal <|-- Zebra
Animal : +int age
Animal : +String gender
Animal: +isMammal()
Animal: +mate()
class Duck{
+String beakColor
+swim()
+quack()
}
class Fish{
-int sizeInFeet
-canEat()
}
class Zebra{
+bool is_wild
+run()
}
```

```mermaid
gantt
title A Gantt Diagram
dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
section Section
A task           :a1, 2014-01-01, 30d
Another task     :after a1  , 20d
section Another
Task in sec      :2014-01-12  , 12d
another task      : 24d
```
